regen.absent_element: transition between different modes under the Operations State
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow the operator to transition between normal operations mode, training operations mode, and maintenance operations mode while in the Operations State.

regen.absent_element: prevention of simultaneous execution of multiple modes
regen.new_specification: The system shall prevent more than one mode from being active at any given time in the Operations State.

regen.absent_element: specification for preventing simultaneous operation of multiple modes
regen.new_specification: The system shall ensure that only one mode (normal, training, or maintenance) can be active at any given time in the Operations State.

label: The Operations State modes shall not exist concurrently.
absence: action of prohibiting multiple modes from running simultaneously
